attributes.action: Conduct an inquiry into the Ombudsman scheme for financial services
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that the current Ombudsman scheme for financial services is not fit for purpose & fails to take appropriate action in respect of many cases that are reported to them.
 
The Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 provisions for an Ombudsman scheme is meant to provide complainants with an independent means of redress but we do not feel the current Ombudsman achieves this.
 
An inquiry is needed to establish how provisions for an Ombudsman scheme can be improved with accountability.
attributes.background: We want the Government to commission an inquiry into the Ombudsman scheme for financial services, that operates under the Financial Services and Markets Act 2000. This will consider how cases reported to the existing Ombudsman are handled & their effectiveness as protecting the public.
